title: kaN kaNDa deivamAi
sahitya:
kaN kaNDa deivamAi kATSi tarum kandan eNNilAk-kunril kuDi koNDirukkinrAn


anupallavi

  aNDi vandE paNiyum eNNaTra toNDarai kaNDadum parivuDan kAttaruL kUravE


caraNam    paNDai nAL mudalAi bhaktar kaNDu magizha eNDishaiyum paravi maNDiDum pugazhuDan 
daNDayudanAi ten pazhani tigazhum aNNal Aghum avan anbarai aNaikkavE
